main event: A civilian observed what appeared to be balloons rising vertically in Price, Utah on August 23, 1967.
interesting points: The observer noted the objects were brilliantly lit and did not appear to be balloons due to their movement and maneuvering,People in the car with the observer were awakened by the lights directing down towards them,The lights disappeared without a reflection from the ground being observed,The conclusion of the report deemed the objects probable balloons,There are claims of plastic bags being mistaken for balloons.
sighted object: group of brilliantly lit objects resembling balloons
witness description: a civilian driving along with others in the car who were asleep
